name: Timisoara - City of Flowers
description: Nicknamed the Little Vienna or the City of Flowers, Timişoara is considered the informal capital city of the historical Banat.

name: Cluj-Napoca - Treasure City
description: Everything is magical and mesmerizing and every moment here in the city will delight your soul.

name: Brasov - Corona City
description: Fringed by the peaks of the Southern Carpathian Mountains and resplendent with gothic, baroque and renaissance architecture.

name: Oradea - City
description: Oradea is the only Art Nouveau city in Romania recognized for its characteristic secession style buildings

name: Sighisoara - City
description: Sighisoara is an outstanding testimony to the culture of the Transylvanian Saxons, a culture that is coming to a close after 850 years and will continue to exist only through its architectural and urban monuments.

name: Bucuresti - City
description: Known for its wide, tree-lined boulevards, glorious Belle Époque buildings and a reputation for the high life which in the early 1900s earned its nickname of 'Little Paris'

name: Constanta - City
description: Sandy beaches of the Black Sea, old villages, wineries, ancient monuments and the Danube Delta are the best known attractions in or near Constanta.

name: Piatra-Neamt - City
description: Surrounded by wooded mountains and boasting modern comforts, Piatra is one of the most beautiful and vibrant cities in Moldavia

name: Iasi - City
description: Deeply rooted in history, Iasi has been the main centre of Moldavian culture, since late 1300s.

name: Craiova - City
description: An important touristic attraction of our city is the Musical Fountain located in the centre of Craiova.
